climatePledgeFriendly.details: BIFMA LEVEL certifies furniture products by reviewing corporate, facility, and product manufacturing processes against environmental impact, health and wellness, and social responsibility criteria. LEVEL 1

features: 【Computer Desk with Power Outlet】This computer desk includes a built-in socket with 2-Outlet & 2 USB Ports for phone, pad or gaming gears. Whether you need a workstation desk in your home office or a gaming place in your bedroom, this computer desk will meet your needs.
【Ergonomic Design】This computer desk is designed with monitor stand brings your monitor to new heights and keep your sitting posture correct.

【Large Storage Capacity】The pull-out designed drawers can store your notes and paperwork, which increases hidden storage option while keeps your desktop tidy. The monitor stand provides extra storage and display area which helps you organize your desk and maximize a work place.

【Stable and Reliable】The Rolanstar office desk not only features durability and stability but also healthy environment. The metal frame and particle board ensures the stability and durability of the desk. The raw materials that meet the EPA TSCA Title VI and Carb Certification offer you a safe and healthy living environment.

【30mins Assembly & Easy Cleaning】 Comes with clear and detailed instruction, numbered parts, and a L shaped allen wrench, assembly can be done within 30mins. The board is melamine veneer, waterproof and dust free, you only need a wet rag to keep the table clean. Package also includes 4 adjustable feet pads which designed for easy leveling on uneven floors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Great For Teleworking Rolanstar Home Office Desk Convenient Design: A built-in socket with 2-Outlet & 2 USB Ports is enough for your computer, laptop, and phone.Sturdy Construction: Particle Board with stable metal frame ensures the stability and durability.Offering you a comfortable workstation to be productive for throughout the day.
Rolanstar Computer Desk with Monitor Stand & Two Drawers & Power Outlet

Rolanstar Computer Desk Details Convertible Installation The raised shelf (47.2”L x 7.8”W x 3.9”L) is convertible and provides extra storage and display area which help you maximize the computer desk space. Power Outlet We have set up power sockets on the desktop to make it more convenient for you to charge your cell phone, iPad and other electronic devices. Hanging Hooks Headphones with a mic are now an essential thing with meetings. The hooks is great for hanging those things, which are super convenient. Adjustable Foot Make the desk stable and won't wobble with every stroke of your pen or button pressed on your keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little desk
reviews.reviewText: I work from home, and I don’t have a ton of space so needed something compact. I stumbled across this beauty and decided to give it a shot. It arrived in 2 days so delivery was fast, and it was packed well. I was expecting it to take quite a while to put it together, but even assembly wasn’t too bad. Everything was clearly marked and even the alan wrenches and screwdriver needed to assemble it were provided. I used my own ratchet driver just to make things go a bit faster. As a moderately handy woman, after going through and making sure all pieces were there, it only took me about 45-50 minutes to put together by myself. Would have been probably about half the time with a drill though.It is very sturdy which was a concern since you never know when you buy things off Amazon. It looks great in the space and fits my 2 monitors and laptop as seen in the pic. The plug on it is a nice touch as well. Overall very satisfied. I’d recommend this desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great as my HAM radio desk. Easy to put together and love the outlet feature on the top shelf. I would recommend it. And sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice desk, great for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice desk for the price & perfect for apartments or small spaces. The desk had all of the parts included, organized, & it was fairly easy to put together. The only con would be with one of the drawers not gliding in & out smoothly, as well as no washers for the screws, but that wasn't a big deal for me. I needed a desk for work that could hold both of my monitors & didn't take up too much space. Overall great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blindly follow the instructions || Perfect Work table
reviews.reviewText: It is really easy to assemble and robust build!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delightful minimal computer or writing desk
reviews.reviewText: This desk assembled easily, took some time but instructions were very very clear, all the parts were present and tools necessary were included. It looks neat and streamlined in my guest room. Electrical and USB ports in it are a HUGE plus and help add to the organization. Drawers hold enough to be useful but not turn into catchall junk drawers. I'm very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my room!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Need a small reliable computer desk? This one is a steal. Perfect for my room size and has enough storage and desktop space for what I need. Price was great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this desk. I plan on using it as a vanity and may I just say it exceeded my expectations. The color is beautiful, it’s big enough to hold all my stuff, the plug in area is perfect. I could not be more in love with how this is going to look with my room. No bumps or scratches as far as I’m aware. Drawers will help a ton with the amount of storage I’m going to need. All I can say is I could not be more pleased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little desk.
reviews.reviewText: This desk was super easy to put together. When I plugged it in the power supply was glitchy. Amazon put me in touch with the manufacturer and they replaced it with a new one in less than a week. This is our second desk like this. My girlfriend has had hers for over a year and never had an issue. It’s not big or fancy but it does what it says it’ll do. It’s a desk, what more could I ask of it?

I purchased this computer desk for my small bedroom and it's done wonders! I like how there are additional USB and plug outlets built into the desk as well as allowing you a choice of what side to put them on. The drawers provide a lot of space and the instructions were fairly straight forward. Please be aware that the specifically numbered drawers have to be on their respective sides. The desk top holds a lot of weight; as of writing this, I have 2 monitors, a keyboard, both a PS5 and Nintendo Switch controller charging stand as well as 2 full Nintendo Switch systems. Despite all that, it's very sturdy!

reviews.reviewTitle: Why look elsewhere? Get this one.
reviews.reviewText: I’m in uni. I needed a desk to do work on at late nights and at the same time I needed storage, hence, right now this desk is perfect. It was fun to set up, it’s pretty sturdy, very attractive, different levels of platform for me to easily rotate my stuff, and the plug is pretty convenient as well!So though it was a bit over my budget for a desk I wanted, I just closed my eyes, got on with it..and I don’t regret buying it since.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice, sturdy and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Great for my son's room where there is limited space. Lots of storage with the drawers. The outlets on the top are very convenient. Sleek design and very sturdy. Highly recommended.

Quite tiny, barely large enough to fit PC, mlonitor, keyboard and mouse (see pic). I didn't affix the back shelf as it just uses up limited table-top space. Power cord with USB outlets redundant, I have plenty of those. The two drawers are also miniscule, and they stick a little. But it's functional, surprisingly sturdy, and worth the VERY low price for this "Computer Table" (as the box it comes in is labeled. Impossible to find a new actual real desk anywhere near this price point!) . Extraordinarily well organized instructions & parts, including all tools required for set-up, made the lengthy assembly process "almost" fun.

Instructions were pretty good and clear, quality is decent. Don't make the mistake of tightening outside screws too much as it will obviously push in the tube metal.You can turn the power outlet to whatever side you wish. Big part of purchase was dependent on having a power source on desk, this has two outlets amd two USB ports. Should be more, but it's acceptable.Overall I am pleased with this desk and recommend it, material is pretty good. Obviously not balsam wood but not real quality wood, good balance of medium quality.
